arts.ttl: Sunday’s action opens with Sassuolo vs Udinese
arts.sum: The official previous meetings between the two teams in Emilia total 11 matches: 1 Sassuolo victory, 6 draws, and 4 Udinese wins. In the current championship, Sassuolo has scored 4 goals, all of which came in the final 30 minutes of matches - a time period during which Udinese have yet to score.
